content: amigurumi acorn is an original crochet pattern by june gilbank make your own cute and or realistic amigurumi acorns complete with removable cup standing at just over 2 inches tall these little acorns are quick and easy to make **yarn ** small amount of worsted weight yarn in 2 colours for acorn and cup **hook ** e us/3 5mm crochet hook **size ** approx 2 25 6cm tall your gauge and yarn choice will affect the finished size slightly note this pattern is donationware - the pattern is available for free but if you like it please consider sending me a donation to show your appreciation the pdf version available for any size donation is formatted for easy viewing and printing and includes bonus information detailed below the complete pattern is available to view in full for no charge from the linked page pdf version bonus information * how to invisibly stitch the acorn to the cup * an unwired child-safe twig pattern * suggestions for use and bonus tips *** > ***please join us*** *in the planetjune crochet designs > group http //www ravelry com/groups/planetjune-crochet-designs > - you can get pattern support join crochet-alongs show off your fos > suggest new designs and chat all > welcome *
